≈ºe czytajƒÖc ksiƒÖ≈ºkƒô mo≈ºna uroniƒá niejednƒÖ ≈Çzƒô...KsiƒÖ≈ºkƒô w szczeg√≥lno≈õci polecam do przeczytania m≈Çodym pokoleniom...m≈Çodym ludziom...Zawiera ona prawdziwe fakty historyczne...kt√≥re niestety jeszcze kilka lat wstecz nie mia≈Çyby prawa ujrzeƒá ≈õwiat≈Ça dziennego...Czƒôsto nasza historia...historia naszego kraju przedstawiana by≈Ça w spos√≥b nieprawdziwy...ukazywana jakby w krzywym zwierciadle...czƒôsto przek≈Çamywana

i wyboista...Dzisiaj mamy wra≈ºenie, ≈ºe jeste≈õmy wolnym...suwerennym krajem i ten fakt winni≈õmy bardzo doceniƒá...Wiersz...kt√≥ry napisa≈Çam jest rodzajem ho≈Çdu...z≈Ço≈ºonego Lili...jak te≈º wszystkim bohaterom...kt√≥rzy walczyli za wolnƒÖ Polskƒô...przelewajƒÖc swojƒÖ krew...czƒôsto ponoszƒÖc te≈º najwiƒôkszƒÖ ofiarƒô jakƒÖ by≈Ço ich w≈Çasne ≈ºycie...Dzisiaj dziƒôki nim...mo≈ºemy godnie podnosiƒá g≈Çowy...
Nasz kraj nazywaƒá PolskƒÖ a nar√≥d...Narodem Polskim...W szko≈Çach mo≈ºemy uczyƒá siƒô jƒôzyka polskiego...Jak wiemy z kart historii...nasza Ojczyzna niejednokrotnie by≈Ça rozdrapywana...poddawana rozbiorom...naje≈ºd≈ºana przez agresor√≥w 
w celu zagrabienia ziem polskich oraz st≈Çamszenia Narodu Polskiego...

items.text:
CASTING CALL FOR A STUDENT PRODUCTION IN CARDIFF
Looking for three cast members to join a crew of 6 students in Cardiff between 28th February - 14th March. Exact shoot dates to be decided shortly, filming to take place over the course of 3-5 days. 

Read below for more info. 

Email 30125280@students.southwales.ac.uk if interested!

items.text:
CASTING CALL - CLARITY SHORT FILM
An upcoming near-future, sci-fi short film, written and directed by Dylan Burrows. 

 

Filming mid March to April. 

 

Cardiff & Cheltenham, Gloucestershire area.

 

Unpaid, student film. Travel and catering provided.

 

**To apply, please email contactclarityfilm@gmail.com**

items.text:
UNPAID CASTING - Deadline for submissions is Wednesday 18th February 21:00
Casting for a short film shooting in Brighton and surrounding areas in April 2026. You can find character breakdowns and more information in this PDF document - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1wXaWnFW23__-MU6_0fGtQWCEqrAbqqk5/view?usp=sharing

Feel free to share to anyone you think might be interested!

items.text:
**CREW & CAST CALL ‚Äì LG ERGO SPEC COMMERCIAL**

Coventry | Friday 28th February | Unpaid (Portfolio Opportunity)

We are producing a commercial-style spec film inspired by the LG Ergo monitor line, shooting in Coventry on Friday 28th February.

This is a visually polished, tech-focused piece with a clean, modern aesthetic. We are looking to collaborate with passionate creatives who want strong commercial-style material for their portfolio.

**CREW ROLES**

**Grip**

Assist with rigging, shaping light, stands, flags, and general grip support.
Must be hands-on, reliable, and comfortable working within a small commercial-style crew.

**2nd AC (Clapper / Camera Assistant)**

Working with the DP and 1st AC.
Responsibilities include slating, lens support, camera organisation, and maintaining smooth set workflow.

**Location Sound Recordist**

No dialogue.
We require clean capture of practical sound elements including:

 ‚Ä¢ Keyboard and mouse interaction

 ‚Ä¢ Subtle desk movement textures

 ‚Ä¢ Controlled room tone / ambience

Final audio will be sound-designed in post, so well-recorded isolated elements are key. Own kit preferred.

**CASTING ‚Äì ON-SCREEN TALENT (1 Role)**

Male or Female | Playing age 25‚Äì35 | Coventry or surrounding areas

We are casting one talent to portray a modern working professional in a home-office environment.

Performance requirements:

 ‚Ä¢ Confident, natural typing ability

 ‚Ä¢ Comfortable using a mouse

 ‚Ä¢ Focused, engaged eye-lines toward screen

 ‚Ä¢ Subtle, confident smile conveying productivity and ease

Non-speaking role. Strong on-camera presence is essential.

**Self-Tape Requirement:**

Please submit a short video (30‚Äì60 seconds) of yourself:

 ‚Ä¢ Sitting at a computer/laptop

 ‚Ä¢ Beginning to type naturally

 ‚Ä¢ Clicking and navigating

 ‚Ä¢ Looking focused and engaged

 ‚Ä¢ Ending with a confident, subtle smile

Clear lighting and minimal background noise preferred.

**What‚Äôs Provided (All Roles)**

 ‚Ä¢ Food and transport covered

 ‚Ä¢ Full screen credit

 ‚Ä¢ Permission to use the final film in your portfolio

 ‚Ä¢ BTS photography/video for personal promotion

Coventry
Friday 28th February
Apply: danielandersondop@outlook.com
Please include a short introduction and relevant experience (and self-tape for talent).

topComments.text: Not one for me anyway but you might want to check that date, 28th ain't a Friday!

items.text:
Hey all,  I'm currently working in production on an exciting musical feature film called *"Stuffed"* which has been supported by the BFI. We're currently in post-production and aiming to film a couple of small pick-up bits in London over the coming weeks. As part of this we are looking for a number of cast members to play elderly characters in a nursing home. Applicants must be able to sing and be happy to sing on camera. 

We're looking for different people across two different dates, but most specifically for older actors for Tuesday 3rd March. 

**For any questions or applications, please contact - ****[benheathcasting@gmail.com](mailto:benheathcasting@gmail.com)**

Casting brief and details below:

**WEDNESDAY 25TH FEB **

**Brief: **Looking for various ages/gendered actors that can sing. Actors will be miming but must have a sense of rhythm and experience singing is even better. 

**Location:** Shoreditch, London

**Timing:** Between 6pm - 9pm but will only be needed for MAX 1hr. 

**Rate:** ¬£75

**TUESDAY 3rd MARCH **

**Brief: **Elderly men & women playing characters in a nursing home. Characters have no more than a few lines to each sing but must be comfortable singing on camera.

Please note that 1x elderly man will be required to be topless with a fake tattoo and so please state if applicant has any tattoos

**Location: **London but TBC

**Timing: **TBC but will be a day shoot and will not be required all day

**Rate:** ¬£200

**For anyone interested please send a headshot & video of you singing to ****[benheathcasting@gmail.com](mailto:benheathcasting@gmail.com)**** and state your availability. **

We are casting 6 roles for our upcoming short film ‚ÄòSquare One‚Äô. A story about perfectionism and reigniting one‚Äôs passions.

Self Tape Auditions

Enquiries to: asimulationpictures@gmail.com

items.text:
CASTING CALL - ‚ÄúThe Sins of Our Father‚Äù
Hi everyone! My name is Emma and I‚Äôm the associate producer for the upcoming feature film The Sins of Our Father. We are excited to be starting our casting process! 

Filming will be taking place mid May to early August, every second weekend approximately (tentatively), in the greater Vancouver area. It is a volunteer project (with IMDb credit, copy, and great company). This will be a UBCP ultra low budget feature film. 

If you are interested in being apart of this amazing project please email your demo reel, resume, and the name of the character you‚Äôre auditioning for to thesinsofourfatherfilm@gmail.com by March 8th.

Synopsis:

The Sins of Our Father dissects the crumbling legacy of the Montgomery family in a narrative that blends gritty family drama with surreal, lo-fi sci-fi.

The story begins with Clive, a dying pawnshop owner and lifelong hustler who attempts one final con: using a mysterious, memory-altering projector to force a reconciliation with his estranged children. With his twisted understanding of fatherhood, he plans to "overwrite" their trauma to stage one final, perfect memory.

The film unfolds in an exploration of the fallouts with his three children: Maddie, the eldest, paralyzed by the fear of inheriting her father‚Äôs toxicity; Leland, a debt-ridden filmmaker shooting adult content to survive; and Julian, a recluse who has signed a "deal with the devil" by accepting tuition sponsorship from Clive‚Äôs ruthless rival, Vance.

The plan shatters when Clive misuses the device. As the siblings uncover the truth, their own demons collide with external threats‚Äîincluding Vance and a gang of "trustafarian" loan sharks‚Äîwho descend on the family home to seize the mysterious projector.

In a chaotic climax that blurs the line between memory and reality, the siblings must weaponize the device to escape. Ultimately, Clive makes the only selfless choice of his life, resulting in his children finally being free.

attachments.ocrText: May be an image of text that says 'Casting Call THE SINS OF OUR FATHER Are you more than the sum of your father's S mistakes?'

May be an image of text that says 'Main MainCast Cast CLIVE 60s, MALE, WHITE Stubborn. Proud. Assertive. A lifelong grifter and owner of Vancouver's S last independent pawnshop. Clive treated fatherhood like a transaction he could negotiate Too proud to apologize for the trauma he inflicted, he views the memory- altering projector not as a sci-fi miracle, but as the ultimate "fix" to reunite his dysfunctional family.'

May be an image of text that says 'Main Cast MADDIE 35, FEMALE, WHITE/BIRACIAL BIRACIAL Analytical. Caring. Avoidant. Clive's eldest daughter whose fear of becoming her father has paralyzed her ability to move forward. Terrified that her "fucked up" lineage makes her unfit for motherhood, she over-analyzes every aspect of her life and avoids her emotions to avoid making irrational mistakes.'

May be a graphic of one or more people and text that says 'Main MainCas Cast Phon LELAND 30, MALE, WHITE WHITE/BIRACIAL BIRACIAL Free-spirited. Lax. Unbothered. Deep in debt to dangerous "trustafarians" Leland, who is director of adult content, is the result of Clive pushing him too hard to succeed in field he wasn't interested in; now, having taken huge risk by pursuing filmmaking he is paralyzed, afraid that his unsuccessful filmmaking career will prove Clive right.'

May be an image of text that says 'Main MainCast Cast JULIAN 24, MALE, WHITE/BIRACIAL Geeky. Sentimental. Quick-witted. The youngest and damaged by the need for Œ± father figure A university student with commitment issues and knack for repairing broken electronics. Alienated by Clive, Julian has signed 'deal with the devil," accepting tuition sponsorship from Clive' arch-rival, Vance -a decision that legally binds him to the villain.'

items.text:
We're looking for **volunteer background performers **for our film, Hair or No Hair, for a dance party scene,** filming March 23 - 25th **in the Mount Pleasant area in Vancouver, BC. *Please note, we may not require all the background performers for full days.*

We strongly encourage a diverse crowd of people to submit, with a highlight on BIPOC folks. This film is Black female led, and the party is inclusive of everyone, and will showcase the Drag and Go-Go dancing scene in Vancouver.

If you are interested, please register via this link by Feb 27th:
[https://forms.gle/A2SDDnwHHe8g7N1MA](https://forms.gle/A2SDDnwHHe8g7N1MA)

items.text:
**SHORT FILM CASTING CALL - ‚ÄúTAKEAWAYS‚Äù**

**OPEN TO UNION & NON-UNION - VOLUNTEER/UNPAID**

**DIRECTOR:** Jamie Lam

**CATEGORY:** Independent Short Film - UBCP ULB

**CASTING DIRECTOR:** Cathy Huynh

**COMPENSATION:** Volunteer/Unpaid. Food provided on set. Copy of film. IMDB credit.

**FILMING DATES/LOCATION:** March 21-22, 2026 (TBC) / Vancouver, BC

**SUBMISSION INSTRUCTIONS:** Please email **takeawaysfilm@gmail.com** with the subject heading

**[Your Name - Role Name]** and include your headshot/photo, resume and demo reel (if applicable)

**LOGLINE:** A reluctant young boy working at his family‚Äôs restaurant learns to step up as his father quietly falls apart after his loss.

**ANDY ‚Äî Male, 10-15, Chinese or East Asian-identifying.** Smart but apathetic, Andy is tired of helping out at the family restaurant, much rather preferring to play PC games at home. Even so, he takes after his dad Sam, embodying kindness and warmth when times get tough - LEAD. CANTONESE PROFICIENCY IS A PLUS.

**SAM ‚Äî Male, 40-50, Chinese or East Asian-identifying.** A caring and kind father, Sam owns and operates the family restaurant. His wife left him a year ago, leaving him to take care of Andy and the restaurant by himself. He grapples with being a good father while trying to manage his own grief - LEAD. MUST SPEAK FLUENT CANTONESE.

**FEMALE CUSTOMER ‚Äî Female, 35-45, Chinese or East Asian-identifying.** This female customers a regular at Sam‚Äôs restaurant. While paying for her food, she praises Andy for being such a well-brought up kid. 2 lines, 1 scene.

**FEMALE CUSTOMER‚ÄôS DAUGHTER ‚Äî Female, 5-10, Chinese or East Asian-identifying.** This young girl accompanies her mother to the restaurant. No lines, 1 scene.

**LINDA ‚Äî Female, 40-50, Chinese or East Asian-identifying.** Linda is Sam‚Äôs ex-wife. She is seen happily walking with another man, as Sam watches from his restaurant‚Äôs window. No lines, 1 scene.

**YOUNG BOYS ‚Äî Male, 10-15, Open ethnicity.** These young boys wave at Andy while he works at the restaurant. No lines, 1 scene.

items.text:
**Mini serial wojenny 1940 ‚Äì Szukamy kobiety do roli maszynistki SS!  **

Nasza Gliwicka Grupa Pasjonat√≥w ‚Äò‚Äô**Grupa1940**‚Äô‚Äô poszukuje kobiety **w wieku 30 ‚Äì 40 lat** **o blond w≈Çosach** do roli maszynistki/sekretarki do biura oficera Waffen SS najlepiej **o wzro≈õcie 170 ‚Äì175 cm. Postaƒá ta bƒôdzie mieƒá swoje kwestie po niemiecku ju≈º w 2 odcinku.**

** **

 Szukamy kogo≈õ z **Gliwic lub okolic**: Zabrze, Katowice najdalej gdy≈º odleg≈Ço≈õƒá do tej roli ma znaczenie. Same zdjƒôcia bƒôdƒÖ realizowane na terenie Gliwic. Od maja do ko≈Ñca sieprnia  szykujemy siƒô do kilku scen bitewnych z francuzami. Kilka postaci ma niedu≈ºe kwestie po niemiecku. **Mundur i wyposa≈ºenie jeste≈õmy w stanie po≈ºyczaƒá.**

 

**Od maja 2026 planujemy realizacje zdjƒôc do tego **projektu. Bƒôdziemy realizowaƒá mini serial oparty o wƒÖtki grupy okultystycznej ‚Äô‚Äô**Ahnenerbe‚Äô**‚Äô kt√≥ra chce zdobyƒá s≈Çynne artefakty ale w tym kto≈õ im chce przeszkadzaƒá. Projekt bƒôdzie  siƒô sk≈Çadaƒá z 6 odcink√≥w po 10/12 minut ka≈ºdy. Bƒôdziemy te≈º sukcesywnie dodawaƒá inne og≈Çoszenia zwiƒÖzane z tym projektem. Mile widziane zdjƒôcia aktualne. Na zdjƒôciu powy≈ºej osoba bƒôdzie mieƒá podobny kostium.** **Umieszczone materia≈Çy sƒÖ z naszej sesji.** Nie bƒôdzie to zlecenie p≈Çatne.**

 

Od 01.04.25 za≈Ço≈ºyli≈õmy sw√≥j kana≈Ç na portalu youtube z filmami z naszych plan√≥w ≈ºeby mo≈ºna by≈Ço zobaczyƒá jak to u nas wyglƒÖda od kuchni. 

 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE8KyfwpyFGzzwUDqdwy74g

 

Wiƒôcej informacji na Priv

**Serial nie jest stworzony z sympatii do tej nazistowskiej organizacji lecz wynika to z samego scenariusza aby ukaza≈Ç zbrodnie i sam fakt i≈º by≈Ça w pe≈Çni z≈Ça. W produkcji znajdƒÖ siƒô osoby, kt√≥re bƒôdƒÖ chcieƒá walczyƒá i potƒôpiaƒá te wielkie z≈Ço jakim by≈Ç nazizm. W oparciu o Dz.U.2017.0.2204 t.j. - Ustawa z dnia 6 czerwca 1997 r. - Kodeks karny,Art. 256 "Propagowanie faszyzmu lub innego ustroju totalitarnego lub nawo≈Çywanie domnienawi≈õci", ¬ß3 - nie narusza prawa proponujƒÖc przedmiot do cel√≥w historycznych lub kolekcjonerskich.**

üî• TWO POWERFUL DANCE SOLOS AT KNAP! üî•
üìÖ December 10, 2025 at 7 PM
üìç KNAP ‚Äì Concert Hall, Ivaniƒágradska 41a, Zagreb
‚ú® FREE ENTRY!

Join us for a captivating evening within KNAP‚Äôs Offbeat program, featuring two striking solo performances that delve deep into the questions of identity, transformation, and the inevitability of change.

In I SAMO, choreographer and performer Bruno Isakoviƒá confronts the modern obsession with constant self-improvement. Through an intimate, physical dialogue, the piece dismantles the myth of the ‚Äúbetter version of oneself‚Äù and opens a space for sincerity, vulnerability, and authentic presence.

In KRAJ KRAJEVA, performed by Mia Zalukar, the focus shifts toward the countless endings‚Äîsubtle, unexpected, or monumental‚Äîthat punctuate our daily lives. The work invites us to reflect on how we face closure, what we resist or accept, and how endings might quietly reframe our beginnings.

Together, these two solos offer a powerful meditation on who we are while striving, changing, finishing, and beginning again. Expect an evening of deeply felt movement, thought-provoking concepts, and artists who approach the stage with uncompromising honesty.

üéüÔ∏è Free tickets available at the link in the first comment.
Don‚Äôt miss this unique double bill!

üé¨ Produkcija: UO Malo sutra
üé≠ Koprodukcija: Domino

U svijetu u kojem se od nas tra≈æi da budemo ‚Äûbolje verzije sebe‚Äú, Bruno Isakoviƒá u svom solo komadu razotkriva paradoks osobnog rasta: ≈°to ako je ≈æelja za neprekidnim usavr≈°avanjem samo zamka ‚Äî i ako zapravo najvi≈°e rastemo kad dopustimo sebi da ne budemo savr≈°eni?
‚ÄûI samo‚Äú je koreografski poziv na iskrenost, ranjivost i autentiƒçnost, na tijelo koje ne glumi hologram nego govori istinu.

‚∏ª

KRAJ KRAJEVA

üë§ Koreografija i izvedba: Mia Zalukar
üéº Glazba: Hrvoje Nik≈°iƒá
üìù Dramaturgija: Margareta Sinkoviƒá
üé® Umjetniƒçka suradnica: Lucija Bari≈°iƒá
üé¨ Produkcija: UO Malo sutra
üé≠ Koprodukcija: Domino

Koliko ‚Äûkrajeva‚Äú mo≈æemo do≈æivjeti u jednom jedinom danu? I mo≈æemo li ih prepoznati, oznaƒçiti, ispratiti?
U solo izvedbi ‚ÄûKraj krajeva‚Äú, Mia Zalukar otvara prostor za razgovor s neizbje≈ænim zavr≈°ecima ‚Äî onim krupnim i onim sitnim, svakodnevnim. Kroz cikliƒçnu izvedbu, pokret i promi≈°ljanje, ona stvara intiman dijalog s prolazno≈°ƒáu i propituje kako se pripremamo za kraj‚Ä¶ i ≈°to se dogodi kad ga napokon prihvatimo.

‚∏ª

üéüÔ∏è Ulaz slobodan ‚Äî pridru≈æite nam se na veƒçeri koja otvara prostor za promjenu, prihvaƒáanje i novo gledanje na sebe i svijet.

items.text:
I have been engaged in a very busy mission, consistently advocating for what is right. 

I was grateful to be a guest on Sonia Poulton's 'WAKE UP' show this morning, where we discussed my upcoming short film premiere, 'Where Are the Children?' and various other topics.

Feel free to listen/watch and share!

Love Leyton

‚ö°Ô∏èNeed to create your first showreel / freshen up your old one?‚ö°Ô∏è
Happy Sunday all!

I provide a very affordable showreel service for new or established actors/directors/cinematographers/comedians/hobbyists etc.

Basically, send me your footage (or I can try and source it for you online if it's commercially aired) and I shall edit it together into a lovely reel.

Please see samples of recent clients in the link below üòé

I'm an actor myself so I know how frustrating it can be, especially when you're starting out, to collate your footage together to get more work, without wanting to spend a fortune.

My rates are ¬£20/hour, with duration of work depending on how much footage you have. The average reels have been around ¬£80-¬£100 for my clients. Much more affordable than the companies that charge ¬£250+ !!

For any further info / enquiries / to book my services, drop me an email and I'll respond as quickly as I can:

reelsforanyone@gmail.com

I'll look forward to hearing from you.

Thanks!

üòé

www.youtube.com/@Reels.For.Anyone

Hi all ‚Äî I‚Äôm Katie Louise Grant, a British actress based in Greater London / Hertfordshire, currently seeking new opportunities across stage and screen.

I‚Äôm in my final year of training on the BA (Hons) Acting and Performance at London Media Academy (graduating 2026). Recent stage credits include Mother Courage in Mother Courage and Her Children and Leah in DNA.

I play 18‚Äì24, with a strong grounding in drama, comedy, musical theatre, and emotionally demanding material. I‚Äôm collaborative, reliable, and bring depth and clarity to every role.

üé≠ Spotlight: https://app.spotlight.com/7055-0165-6097

üìç Self-represented

Thanks ‚Äî and happy to connect.

items.text:
CASTING CALL!! HENRY'S GHOST - A COVID-19 STORY
# A lonely widower, driven by the aftermath of COVID-19 isolation, attempts to prove to his son the presence of a spirit haunting his flat, whom he quietly believes to be his wife.

Short Film (15 minutes)

DRAMA 

Manchester-based only!

Travel + Catering provided 

Filming Mid-April 

From Director ***Jacob James Ward*** with previous works such as *'Fallowfield' *and *'he lives here'* which are currently on the festival circuit, comes a film experience with foundations deep within the essential worker communities affected by COVID-19. 

CASTING FOR
# ***HENRY STONE ***
## ***45 - 55 YEARS OLD ***
## ***MALE***
## ***ANY ETHNICITY ***

Henry, a veteran bus driver struggling with survivors guilt, lives as a stoic, working class representation of the mismanagement of the COVID era in the UK. While working as a bus driver at the height of COVID, Henry slowly saw the toll the pandemic had on his social infrastructure - losing friends, and eventually, his wife.  Now, years later with little attempt to process his tragic loss, he makes an attempt to fill the void created by his loneliness by slowly falling down the rabbit hole of conspiracy theories and is disillusioned by the prospect of a ghost living in his flat who he believes to be his late wife. In a desperate attempt, he tries to convince it's existence to his son. 

# ***JAMES STONE ***
## ***20 - 25 YEARS OLD ***
## ***MALE ***
## ***ANY ETHNICITY ***

Despite living a life surviving it all, Henry can now only be saved by his lone son - James.

James, burdened by the pressures of university, his job and his father's declining mental state, represents the loss of youth and importance of growing responsibility brought on by COVID for young people. James sorely wants to reconnect with his father and help them both move on from the death of James' mother. James must convince his father to stop looking for the dead and start talking to the living - which is easier said than done. 

# *EXTRAS WANTED!!*
## ***20 - 60 YEARS OLD ***
## ***ANY GENDER ***
## ***ANY ETHNICITY ***

We are seeking extras to portray Henry's co-workers in a key sequence that explores and visualises his grief and survivor's guilt. 

If you're interested in being part of this important scene and enhancing the world that we are building, please get in touch!!

***CREW:***

DIRECTOR - JJ Ward 

PRODUCER - George Grant 

CINEMATOGRAPHER - Jack Gaskell 

EDITOR - Matthew Wadham 

SOUND DESIGNER - Jacob Kelly 

Our entire crew has a powerful personal connection to COVID, with myself (the Director) having been locked down during my formative years between GCSEs and A-LEVELs. Many more of you out there will have your own Covid story and we'd love to hear from you!

If this sounds like something you'd be interested working on, with an experienced crew looking to take this to film festivals and beyond, then please get in touch! We'll be sending over script segments and asking for self tapes at this time, with studio auditions to come later :) 

Short Film (15 minutes)

DRAMA 

Manchester-based only!

Travel + Catering provided 

Filming Mid-April 

SPEAK SOON!

CONTACTS:
* Message me on this account :)
* Email the director: jacobward044@gmail.com
* Email the producer: georgefgrant@icloud.com

JAMES STONE MALE 20-25 YEARS OLD ETHNICITY: ANY JAMES, BURDENED BY THE PRESSURES OF UNIVERSITY, HIS JOB AND HIS FATHER'S MENTAL STATE, REPRESENTS THE LOSS OF YOUTH AND IMPORTANCE OF GROWING RESPONSIBILITY BROUGHT ON BY COVID FOR YOUNG PEOPLE. items.title: CASTING CALL (Houston, TX)

sharedPost.text:
---

üåÄüé¨üé•üåö Exclusive Acting Workshop ‚Äì Final Version .version A.

VERY LOW COST: One-on-One Online via Skype

"This course integrates the poetic realism of Tarkovsky, the practical wisdom of Michael Caine, and the transformative techniques of Stanislavski and Method Acting. Designed to deepen your craft, it focuses on authentic emotional connection and powerful storytelling."

üé¨ Created by a British Cinematographer/Director with 31 Years of Experience and 32 Features to His Name

üåê International Experience: Having worked on films worldwide, collaborating with actors and directors, I bring real-world insights from both sides of the camera. This course is designed to give actors a deep understanding of their craft, emphasizing emotional depth and character development.

üåê IMDb: www.imdb.com/name/nm1806508

üåê Showreel: https://enkiproductions1.8b.io

---

ü§î What You Will Learn:

üåÄ Emotional Range: Master the ability to express a full spectrum of emotions, making your performances more believable and compelling.

üåÄ Character Development: Create rich, multidimensional characters by exploring their internal world, external actions, and backstory.

üåÄ Method Acting: Use personal experiences and emotions to deliver raw, authentic performances.

üåÄ Working with Directors and Crew: Learn how to hit marks, understand shooting ratios, and collaborate with crew members to enhance your performance.

üåÄ Scene Preparation: Techniques for script interpretation, emotional connection, and performing under pressure.

üåÄ Industry Standards: How to create a professional showreel and work effectively with casting directors and filmmakers.

---

üé¨ Day 1: Moment-to-Moment Acting (Stanislavski‚Äôs Approach)

üîπ Breaking a Scene Down: The use of internal visualization and meditation to "become" the character.

Character Exercise: The Hitman‚Äôs First Kill

üìç Scene: A low-rent hotel room in Manhattan, lit by a dull winter‚Äôs midday light. The sad hum of a ceiling fan, distant sirens, muted traffic below. On the bed‚Äîa brand-new sniper rifle.

üîπ Exercise 1 (Singular Emotion): Enter the room, pick up the gun, examine it, and prepare for the target. Remain fully in character.

üîπ Exercise 2 (Multiple Emotional Shifts):

1. Enter slightly out of breath, feeling relief‚Äî"I made it here. No one saw me."

2. The weight of reality sets in‚Äî"Am I really about to kill someone?"

3. Mesmerized by the artistry of the gun‚Äîdraw on memories of seeing/touching weapons.

4. Snapped back to reality by a siren‚Äîtrace the feeling of waking from a dream.

5. Decision made‚Äîmove to the window, set up the gun, and wait.

üîπ Discussion: How do actors like Heath Ledger, Daniel Day-Lewis, and Dustin Hoffman make their characters so real? Insights from my own experiences on set with actors who never broke character‚Äîeven during dinner.

Exercise 3 (If Time Allows): The Phone Call

üìç Scene: You‚Äôve done something terrible‚Äîenough to make the person you love most leave forever. You must convince them to stay.

üé≠ Goal: Improvise, using pure emotional truth, until the performance is undeniably real.

---

üé¨ Day 2: Making Your Character Believable

üîπ Understanding the Psyche: Whether playing a killer or an ordinary person, you must know your character‚Äôs mind.

Character Exercise: The Breaking Point

üìç Scene: A crowded supermarket. A tired voice announces deals over the PA. You feel unseen, unheard, frustrated‚Äîuntil suddenly, you‚Äôre holding an AK-47. (Note: These scenes are purely acting exercises. They can be altered if a student is uncomfortable.)

üîπ Alternative Scene: A character about to detonate a bomb, written in the style of Heath Ledger‚Äôs Joker.

üîπ Alternative Scene: A video call to the person you love most‚Äîtelling them why. (Scripted or improv.)

üìç Final Monologue Exercise: "Hi everyone‚Ä¶ Tomorrow‚Äôs going to be different." The last words before an irreversible decision.

üîπ Accents: Versatility in performance‚Äîworking with British, American (Deep South), and Northern Irish accents.

üîπ Final Exercise: The Power of Stillness‚Äîsit before the camera, smiling, at total peace. Convey pure serenity.

---

üé¨ Day 3: Working with a Director and Crew

üîπ Understanding Your Role: How an actor fits into the filmmaking process.

üîπ Hitting Marks & Lighting: The technical side of making performances shine.

üîπ Shooting Ratios: How they affect your performance.

üîπ Crew Collaboration: Understanding continuity, sound, makeup, cinematography, and direction.

Final Showreel Scenes (Day 3):

üé≠ Sinister: "So you really think you got away with it? You really think that?" (Improv)

üé≠ Heartbroken: "But I didn‚Äôt mean it... please, please, don‚Äôt leave me‚Ä¶" (Improv)

üé≠ Insane (Joker-like): "Mmm... if E = mc¬≤, then time versus chaos... who cares?" (Improv)

üé≠ Flat & Emotionless: "We‚Äôre born, we live, we die. That‚Äôs it." (Improv)

üîπ Goal: Draw from personal experiences and trace memories to make the performances deeply real.

---

üé¨ Day 4: Fear and Survival ‚Äì Personal Experience & Character Creation

üîπ Deep Dive: Exploring fear, survival, and desperation in character work.

Exercise 1: The Jungle Escape

üìç Scene: You‚Äôre lost in the jungle at night, exhausted, your breath the only sound. Every step is agony, but stopping means death. You call out‚Äîpleading for help. No answer.

üé≠ Emotions to Explore:

1. Fear of death ‚Äì the realization that no one is coming.

2. Desperation ‚Äì the raw instinct to survive.

3. Physical exhaustion ‚Äì feeling your body give in.

üé≠ Method Process:

1. Internal Visualization ‚Äì Close your eyes, hear the insects, the rustling leaves, your pounding heartbeat.

2. Personal Connection ‚Äì Recall a moment when you felt completely lost or afraid.

3. Scene Execution ‚Äì Let the emotions guide your body and voice.

Exercise 2: The Phone Call Redux

üìç Scene: You‚Äôre on the phone with a loved one. You need their help. If they refuse, it‚Äôs over. What do you say? What do you leave out?

üé≠ Objective: Make the desperation feel real. This is life or death.

---

Final Performance (Day 4):

Students will perform a final emotional scene, bringing together everything they‚Äôve learned. These performances will be recorded as raw material for their showreel.

---

üé¨üé• Ready to Elevate Your Acting?

This isn‚Äôt just a class‚Äîit‚Äôs an intense, immersive experience that will change the way you act forever.

üåê To Enroll: p.m.me or e.mail:

mikeenkiproductions1@gmail.com

Let‚Äôs create something unforgettable.

items.text:
Hi there! Just wanted some advice on this, I‚Äôm a drama graduate and I really want to get into the casting and talent management side of the industry. The dream is to become a casting assistant/PA and work my way up to be a casting director one day! I‚Äôm based in the North West but all the vacancies I‚Äôve been seeing on CGD and PMA have all been London based. 
Please let me know if any tips or anyone I can get into contact with regarding this. 
Thank you in advance!

topComments.text: Speak to LA productions and other independent companies. They might have some work experience vacancies.

items.summary:
Hi there! Just wanted some advice on this, I‚Äôm a drama graduate and I really want to get into the casting and talent management side of the industry. The dream is to become a casting assistant/PA and work my way up to be a casting director one day! I‚Äôm based in the North West but all the vacancies I‚Äôve been seeing on CGD and PMA have all been London based. 
Please let me know if any tips or anyone I can get into contact with regarding this. 
Thank you in advance!
items.title: Hi there! Just wanted some advice on this, I‚Äôm a drama graduate and I really want to get into the casting and talent management side of the industry. I‚Äôm based in the North West but all the vacancies I‚Äôve been seeing on CGD and PMA have all been London based.

**Fremtidens pensionister er ikke, som de var engang.**
Vi s√∏ger en mandlig statist i alderen **60‚Äì75 √•r** til en reklamefilm, der hylder det aktive, nysgerrige og ungdommelige liv ‚Äì ogs√• n√•r h√•ret er blevet gr√•t.

Kort fortalt skal vi producere en lille film for et af Nykredits subbrands ‚Äì pensionsopsparingsproduktet **Lokal Pulje Invest**.

Konceptet hedder *‚ÄúVi bliver yngre og yngre, n√•r vi bliver √¶ldre‚Äù* og handler om, at fremtidens pensionister er gladere, sundere og mere ungdommelige end tidligere generationer. Derfor viser reklamefilmen cool, gr√•h√•rede personer i situationer, man normalt kun forbinder med unge.

**Torsdag d. 5/3**
Optagelserne foreg√•r i Silkeborgomr√•det og best√•r ligeledes af tre scener: en vinterbadescene, en bustur og en b√•lhygge-scene. Optagelserne varer fra kl. 11.00‚Äì19.00.

**Der gives et honorar p√• 2.000 kr. for dagen**.

Materialet skal bruges p√• sociale medier og website (3 √•rs rettigheder).

Udfyld gerne nedenst√•ende formular ‚Äì vi gl√¶der os til at h√∏re fra dig.

items.text:
ùêÄùêÇùêìùêàùêçùêÜ ùêåùêÄùêíùêìùêÑùêëùêåùêàùêçùêÉ - ùêÑùêîùêëùêéùêèùêÑ ùüêùüéùüêùüî

Vi √•bner nu for ans√∏gninger til en 5 dages privat mastermind for skuespillere som afholdes i Europa en dato imellem (April og Juli).

Ophold i eksklusiv bolig f.eks villa eller slot.
(Umiddelbart i sydens sol)
15 pladser i alt.

6 pladser er allerede reserveret til interne talenter og inviterede deltagere.
9 √•bne ans√∏gningspladser tilbage.

Dette er en lukket Mastermind for skuespillere, der arbejder seri√∏st med deres karriere og √∏nsker at rykke sig professionelt.

Masterminden inkluderer eksempelvis.:

‚Ä¢ Strategisk karriere-workshop og branchepositionering
‚Ä¢ opl√¶g og networking med instrukt√∏rer, producere og branchefolk
‚Ä¢ Kommunikation og voice coaching
‚Ä¢ Mental performance coaching
‚Ä¢ ‚Å†diverse workshops (make up, dans eller andet) 
‚Ä¢ Personlig feedback p√• dit materiale
‚Ä¢ Hj√¶lp til at lave aktuelle castings
‚Ä¢ Professionelle headshots og brandingbilleder
‚Ä¢ Produktion af en professionelt instrueret kortfilm - alle f√•r replikroller og reel scenetid
‚Ä¢ Behind-the-scenes content og materiale til SoMe
‚Ä¢ Fuld forplejning under hele opholdet - privat chef
‚Ä¢ Afslutningsarrangement
‚Ä¢ Gave til alle deltagere
‚Ä¢ ‚Å†og andre Surprises 

Der vil eksempelvis v√¶re bes√∏g fra Sven-Ole Thorsen.

Form√•let er ikke blot en inspirerende tur - men konkret materiale, netv√¶rk og strategisk retning, som kan styrke din position i branchen.

Prisramme: 18.000 - 25.000 kr.

Vi arbejder med ans√∏gning og personlig godkendelse.

Yderligere information fremsendes ved kvalificeret henvendelse.

Send en privat besked eller mail p√•: 
Mastermind@rubiorex.com

 med:

- Hvorfor √∏nsker du at deltage?
- Hvorfor skal vi invitere dig? 

Kun seri√∏se henvendelser √∏nskes! 

Mvh 
Matthias og Kenneth 
RubioRex.com

items.text:
Hi! I'm Lizzie, I'm casting for a shoot that will happen on Feb 24 in LA. We're looking for two child actors (around ages 5-8)- two boys who will play brothers, so if there are a pair of brothers that'd be great! It's for a comedy video for socials for a well known short form creator. 

*Boys will have to shave their heads for the shoot and be comfortable wearing goatee makeup (the joke is that they look like the actor playing their father.)*

Paid gig!

items.text: Quick question ‚Äî when you get sides and nobody's free to run lines with you, what do you do? I used to record the other character on my phone and play it back but the timing was always terrible lol. Curious what works for everyone else?

topComments.text: I use ColdRead is designed for this and helps act like a reader during self tapes too

When you record the other character... read the lines out loud for it (and maybe in a different tone/voice) and in your mind (silent) for your character... so the timing would line up nicely when you play back that audio and record your scene üòÄ

items.text: Hello, I'm Michelle and something to know about me is I have a talented daughter who wants to act and sing

topComments.text:
Hi Michelle may I suggest joining Children's Acting, Modelling, Casting Calls & FREE Advice for Parents UK which has lots of advice including a list of reputable recommended agencies in featured posts.

Please be aware that it is very oversaturated with thousands of kids registered and vying for limited jobs... See it as an expensive hobby and if lucky enough to get a job (vast majority never book despite talent and years of trying) that is a bonus üòä

Maybe a local theatre club. Loads of them everywhere or maybe she knows colleagues from school going to similar clubs. I can't specifically name any of them as I don't want to come across as an advert

*Calling all opinionated people ‚Äì we need you! We‚Äôre looking for people with hot takes to feature in a new comedy panel show (from the creators of Romesh Ranganathan‚Äôs Parents‚Äô Evening) starring some of the UK‚Äôs best loved comedians.*

* *

*If you love arguing your corner and can defend your bizarre beliefs against the doubters then we want to hear from you!*

*Summer is the WORST season! Music SHOULD be played out loud on public transport! Footballers aren‚Äôt paid ENOUGH! No opinion is too daft, niche or provocative for us and we want to hear YOURS!*

* *

*Filming will take place at Riverside Studios in Hammersmith London from 28th-31st March If you‚Äôre interested in taking part then email casting@rangabee.com for more information and an application link.*

* *

*All applicants must be 18+.*

*Your data will be used in accordance with our privacy policy which can be found here: *[https://www.rangabee.com/privacy-policy](https://www.rangabee.com/privacy-policy)

items.text:
Auditions
Waiting for the Parade
by John Murrell
Don't miss your chance to audition for Pivot Theatre's upcoming production of this Canadian classic!
The word 
Director:Kayt Roth
Producer:The Pivot Theatre Team
Audition Dates:
February 22, 2026 at 12:00 pm
February 23, 2026 at 7:00 pm
Audition Venue: 
Progress Lab 1422 (1422 William Street, Vancouver)
Audition Requirements: 
Auditions will be cold reads from the script
Production Dates: 
April 11 and 12, 2026

Show Venue: 
Progress Lab 1422 (1422 William Street, Vancouver)
Rehearsals:
First rehearsal Wednesday, February 25, 2026, then Tuesday and Thursday evenings and all day Saturdays beginning March 3, 2026.
Synopsis:          
On the home front in Calgary during World War II, five women deal with loneliness, infidelity, heartbreak, and friendship as they support the troops, the Red Cross, and each other. This play showcases the women who stayed behind, and focuses on the effect that the war has on them, their relationships, and their families.
Characters Required:
CATHERINE (F, late 20s to early 30s): Her husband is off fighting in Europe. Practical and easygoing, works against his wishes to make ends meet. Singing ability an asset.
JANET (F, mid to late 30s): Uptight. Thinks she‚Äôs in charge. Her husband was excluded from active duty, so she tries twice as hard to make up for it by managing every aspect of local war effort programs. Piano playing and singing ability an asset.
MARGARET (F, mid-40s to 50s): A widow. Religious. Exhausted, with no use for Janet. Worries constantly about dying running in her family, and about her two adult sons, a sailor and a Communist. Singing ability an asset.
EVE (F, 20s): A teacher. In love with screen star Leslie Howard, and unhappy with her much older husband. A na√Øve optimist who is stuck between a war that might last years and a husband eager to, but unable to fight. Throws herself into her work supporting the troops. Singing ability an asset.
MARTA (F, late 20s-early 30s): German-Canadian seamstress. Dealing with her father‚Äôs arrest as a Nazi sympathizer and being ostracized by the community. Singing ability an asset. German accent a must.
 
Notes:  
Auditions are on a first come, first served basis. Actors will be seen in the order they arrive.
Roles are open to everyone regardless of background, race, gender, orientation, or ability. We encourage everyone to audition as we will be casting whoever is best for the role.
Auditions will be cold readings from the script. Actors are encouraged to read the script on their own prior to auditioning. (Note: director will not provide copies of the script.)
Please bring a r√©sum√© and headshot to auditions
This is a NON-EQUITY, volunteer production
Please forward questions to hq@pivottheatre.ca.
 
See you there!
Your Pivot Theatre Team
Pivot Theatre
1422 William Street, Vancouver, BC
 facebook  instagram
To unsubscribe from these emails, please click here.
Unsubscribe
 Sent by MailerLite

items.text:
Hi all! We are in search of three (preferably Norwich based) male actors and one female actor who would be available over the next few weeks for a performance on the 20th or the 21st of March, at the University of East Anglia as part of an exciting showcase.

Male and female lead roles, with two additional male roles. Looking for actors ideally aged between 20-35.

Please feel free to ask for further information and I will get back to you as soon as possible! Auditions are currently taking place at the UEA by appointment.

AUDETEONS: 1GT-22NO FEB REHERSALS: 23RD FEB-18 MAR SHOW: 20W/273T /213T MARGH TH Norwich actors wanted with current availabilitu for short stage play! Contact DM for more inf information: m.matson@uea.ac.uk @markeymatson'

message.text:
Most actors think success is about talent üëÄüëÄ

But sometimes‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs just luck.

In this moment, Bill Fellows reveals the sliding doors moment that changed his career forever ‚Äî and how he almost didn‚Äôt send the self-tape that led to his role in Ted Lasso.

Filming in Budapest.
Tired. Busy. Ready to say no.

Until one actress convinced him to just try.

That one decision changed everything.

If you‚Äôre an actor, filmmaker or creative‚Ä¶ this is your reminder:
üëâ Do the audition.
üëâ Send the tape.
üëâ You never know what could happen.

üéß Full podcast now live on the Cinescope YouTube Channel

This episode is co-produced with Tees Valley International Film Festival, recorded live during the festival weekend.

#TedLasso #ActingAdvice #Filmmaking #ActorsLife #BritishActors

items.text:
After the huge success and high demand for our Phase I acting workshop, we‚Äôre excited to move forward with Phase II and open a brand-new beginners group.

ACTING Workshop

4-Week Practical Course

A hands-on acting course focused on confidence, presence, and truthful performance
in a playful, supportive, international environment.
No experience needed. Just curiosity.

What you‚Äôll work on:

Week 1 Presence & Play
Confidence, focus, and imagination through simple acting games.
üìÖ Thursday, March 5th

Week 2 Truth in Dialogue
Listening, reacting, and speaking naturally on stage.
üìÖ Thursday, March 12th

Week 3 Character & Intention
Objectives, actions, and building believable characters.
üìÖ Thursday, March 19th

Week 4 Camera & Performance
Working on camera, short scenes, and performance awareness.
üìÖ Thursday, March 26th

Starting March 5th, every Thursday 

Why join?
‚Ä¢ Build confidence and presence
‚Ä¢ Learn practical acting tools
‚Ä¢ Beginner-friendly and creative
‚Ä¢ Safe space to try, fail, and grow
‚Ä¢ Fun, social, and engaging

Perfect for
Actors ‚Ä¢ Performers ‚Ä¢ Public speakers ‚Ä¢ Improvers ‚Ä¢ Anyone wanting more confidence expressing themselves

üìç Warsaw City Center
üï° 19:00
üó£Ô∏è Language: English

Limited spots available

Instructor

Jordan Keates is a British actor trained at the Royal Central School of Speech and Drama in London.
He has worked across film, television, theatre, and commercials in the UK and Europe, including Netflix productions, Shakespeare tours, and international film projects.
Jordan brings a practical, grounded approach focused on truthful acting, clarity, and confidence on stage and on camera.

Choose what works for you: buy the full course or just a single session on the link below:

https://fienta.com/pl/camera-action-acting-workshop

Stay connected with Impact Warsaw
Instagram: @impactwarsaw &  @miguelatcomedy 
More events & updates: impactwarsaw.com/events
Discounts, inner-circle updates & secret extras
Join our Telegram community: https://t.me/+xJpuxiG5Au8xMmZk
Questions, collabs, or curious about taking part?
DM us, real people, real replies, real laughs.
We can‚Äôt wait to see you there. Come curious, leave inspired. 

PHASE I (beginners group)üëá

https://fienta.com/pl/camera-action-acting-workshop-phase

Phase II ‚Äì Advanced Group (for actors with experience only)
This group is designed for performers who already have acting experience.
The work is more demanding, faster paced, and focused on deeper scene work and performance precision.

üëâ Apply & book Phase II here:
https://fienta.com/pl/camera-action-acting-workshop-168613

ETHNIC EXTRAS WANTED

WARSAW / WROCLAW

February 18th and 20th - availability on both days required

450 PLN per day üíµ

I am looking for MEN extras to play the role of PRISONERS in Colombian prison of various ethnicities: Latinos and Black people

* dark hair, darker or black complexion, with or without facial hair, tattoes, aged 18+

Shooting days in Wroclaw - we will reimburse your travel expenses and provide accommodation!

Please send your applications to: patrycja@podtytulem.pl

In the subject line: PRISON

In the body of the email: your first and last name, age, phone number, city, and a PHOTO OF YOUR FACE AND FIGURE taken on the day of application only

**Elke Meier ( zastƒôpca Ahnenerbe SS  ) kobieta**

Przedstawione powy≈ºej materia≈Çy sƒÖ z naszych sesji testowych. Kobieta bƒôdzie nosiƒá czarny niemiecki mundur podobny jak na zdjƒôciu.

 

**Elke Meier **‚Äì cz≈Çonek grupy okultystycznej Ahnenerbe. Zastƒôpczyni, prawa rƒôka szefa jednostki poszukiwaczy skarb√≥w Peter‚Äôa Koch‚Äôa w tej organizacji. Bƒôdziemy realizowaƒá mini serial oparty o wƒÖtki grupy okultystycznej ‚Äô‚Äô**Ahnenerbe‚Äô**‚Äô kt√≥ra chce zdobyƒá s≈Çynne artefakty ale w tym kto≈õ im chce przeszkadzaƒá. Projekt bƒôdzie  siƒô sk≈Çadaƒá z 6 odcink√≥w po 10/12 minut ka≈ºdy. Bƒôdziemy te≈º sukcesywnie dodawaƒá inne og≈Çoszenia zwiƒÖzane z tym projektem. Mile widziane zdjƒôcia aktualne. Na zdjƒôciu powy≈ºej osoba bƒôdzie mieƒá podobny kostium.** **Umieszczone materia≈Çy sƒÖ z naszej sesji.** Nie bƒôdzie to zlecenie p≈Çatne.**

 

Wiƒôcej informacji na Priv

**Serial nie jest stworzony z sympatii do tej nazistowskiej organizacji lecz wynika to z samego scenariusza aby ukaza≈Ç zbrodnie i sam fakt i≈º by≈Ça w pe≈Çni z≈Ça. W produkcji znajdƒÖ siƒô osoby, kt√≥re bƒôdƒÖ chcieƒá walczyƒá i potƒôpiaƒá te wielkie z≈Ço jakim by≈Ç nazizm. W oparciu o Dz.U.2017.0.2204 t.j. - Ustawa z dnia 6 czerwca 1997 r. - Kodeks karny,Art. 256 "Propagowanie faszyzmu lub innego ustroju totalitarnego lub nawo≈Çywanie domnienawi≈õci", ¬ß3 - nie narusza prawa proponujƒÖc przedmiot do cel√≥w historycznych lub kolekcjonerskich.**

items.text:
Calling all big personalities!( or if you're great on camera)

Orca Live Studios is looking for hosts for incoming brands and we are urgently looking to book new talent! Skincare, Makeup, Clothing, Personal Care, Lifestyle, you name it! The possibilities are endless and you can be the face of some of your favorite brands. This position personally has made for the most AMAZING experience to put on your acting/modeling portfolio, working with some of the biggest brands in America. Rate: $28/hr + commission, travel opportunities, room for growth within your role! DM ME IF INTERESTED!

[orcashop.co](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=http%3A%2F%2Forcashop.co%2F%3Ffbclid%3DIwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAc3J0YwZhcHBfaWQQMjIyMDM5MTc4ODIwMDg5MgABHnq2MiLLhZc9tzLRZdMOC_8gcQmlJglTqPtyAXyBvFc6xdbkjrqI9rvWWF9D_aem_31y8ZsWhxIDPuDceb1vOEQ&h=AT1e8BsATlP9FhzGrMgE5hQva0B_0rgeqvmGJwhD0U44JoVAfdckOBGvskeBjM6QMTOkPDANoBuFbewyaK1vKlqux1ej7ZwfCg67NaBIlTAl5rZJJxnsmYRPmCuTFyEWcbfMwovbAONeJOjYt_vEcw&__tn__=-UK-R&c[0]=AT22NVnu1AiS-BjsTPmRSWb-hYigh5AYr6gtG7ypJ0FofSfewMoJd3mCSh7zTaHHotVecfXQgAo9_rkGlc-W1JpmBl5O4n81KQDynblrzy-2lP4THd2GwM8LFO1RVj5yDblecVtvnXlpwamgWc6vPw_Qfu8AF1zW4A22YWjYC6d0zw)

üåü Reserving Royalty Casting Call Seeking New Performer üåü
Reserving Royalty is currently seeking to add an additional performer to our professional character cast with a specific need for a performer wishing to play the coveted roles of Elphaba and Tiana (along with other opportunities in our roster). We are looking for a candidate who wants consistent weekend work and who enjoys working with children and is ready to embody these beloved characters and bring them to life for triad families! 

üëë Email your submission to: Hello@reservingroyalty.com
üì© Subject line: CASTING
Please include:
‚ú® Full Name
‚ú® Phone Number
‚ú® Available Start Date
‚ú® Typical Weekend Availability Schedule
‚ú® Two current headshots (one full smile showing teeth & one without a smile)
‚ú® One current waist-up photo
‚ú® One current full-body photo
(Photos do not need to be professional, just clear and current! We wig every character)
üé§ Video Audition:
Please also consider submitting a video of you singing a princess  / Disney song of your choice that best showcases your vocal range. Sing-along style is totally fine, as long as we can hear that you can carry a tune! We sing Happy birthday alot around here!

POSITION: Company Stage Manager

RATE OF PAY: ¬£200 per 2 show day plus accommodation and PD's.

DATES: 11th October - 06th April - 01st November (50 dates in total)

LOCATION: National UK theatre tour

DESCRIPTION: We are looking for a Company Stage Manager for a National children's theatre tour of 'Fireman Sam Live'. Main duties will be Load ins/outs and show cues during the show. They will also share the driving of the touring Luton van with the rest of the crew. As a result the successful candidate will need to be 25 and over for insurance purposes. Please send CV's to marc.featherstone@mt-productions.co.uk

items.text:
Hello Everyone,

My name is Shaun Daly and I currently in early development of producing a brand-new TV show titled ‚ÄòLOCAL TALENT‚Äô. Written and to be directed the talented Bethany McGiveron. The show is set in a town in the North West of England, where in a working-class neighbourhood, a brothel disguised as a ‚Äúsauna‚Äù to the public resides. Within this brothel, we follow the group of women who own, manage and work there. All of whom are an array of characters who get along like a chosen family that will do whatever they can for each other. Helping one another to survive in this modern world that they are all struggling to survive in and catch moments of joy that life is meant to bring to them. 

The show is inspired a little by the Channel 4 documentary A Very British Brothel, along with stories and accounts of people who have worked in the industry. Stories and accounts we are still researching into now. The vibe and tone of the show is a drama/comedy like the likes of the UK Shameless and Brassic to name some examples. It is a show about together, positivity, banter amongst what the characters would consider are their chosen family. However, along with that, each character has their own personal conflicts, struggles, secrets and desperation for survival.

Our plan is to create a pitch package for the series, by producing the pilot episode. Looking to be around 45 to an hour maximum. We are currently in pre-production and are looking to film around the North West, anywhere from Wirral, Liverpool, St Helens and further if necessary.

What we are looking for is talented actors and actresses from around the North West who would be interested in playing the roles below. Warning that the show will explore themes of a sexual nature along with themes of survival and togetherness. Characters will be dressing up in sexy attire for clients and be performing suggestive positions, simulated sexual content and light fetish comedy as well. No intention of nudity to be involved.

If you‚Äôre comfortable with this, then please see the roles below and email shaundaly2510@gmail.com:

**CHELSEA**

Female, 30s,

Curvy, expressive, intimidating and hilarious. A dominatrix with sharp wit and a soft interior she hides well. Natural scouser who has moved away from her past in Liverpool and has found a home working as the Dominatrix of the brothel. Confident, funny, a strong presence within the Brothel.

**LYDIA**

Female, 30s ‚Äì 40s.

Main villain of Series 1. Sharp, polished, cold underneath. Controlling, emotionally volatile. Very manipulative. Knows her beauty can seduce and make slaves of those who fall under her spell. Character will be exploring themes of domestic violence.

**SHIRLEY**

Female, late 30s ‚Äì early 40s.

Body Positive, full figured, curvy, tom boyish character. Short practical hair. Dry humour and fiercely loyal. Childhood best friend of Tammy.

**TAMMY**

Female, late 30s ‚Äì early 40s.

Body Positive, full figured, voluptuous, bubbly, girly, cheerful. Loyal, excitable, forms a comedic duo with Shirley. Warm and expressive. Can be nervous and frantic.

**BIG LIZ**

Trans masculine or non-binary performer, 40s ‚Äì 50s.

Large frame, camp, emotional, theatrical. Switching between dramatic monologues and silly vulnerability. Use of masculine & feminine voice. Strong, comedic, like the mother hen of the group. With only the Manger Julie above them. Seen as second in command and protector of everyone who works for the Brothel.

**MARY** (Receptionist)

Female, 20s - 30s.

Receptionist of the Brothel. Organises all the clients, answers phones, sorts the lunches and evening meals, arranges the rotas for everyone working at the Brothel. She is small, gentle-looking, quietly stressed. The admin backbone of the brothel in the neat office that is seen when you walk in.

**ROSALINE**

Female, 30s.

Slim or average build, messy glamour, clearly exhausted. A touring girl whose unravelling emotional state becomes part of the plot. Mainly featured in the Pilot, may be planned to return for later episodes.

**BLOSSOM**

Female, Dark Skin Toned, late 30s‚Äì40s.

A Nigerian woman who works for the Brothel. She is elegant, expressive, deeply emotional. Balances trauma, fear, and warmth. She has come from a tough background and has come to the UK for a better life. For her, working at the Brothel is that better life, compared to the life she had back in Nigeria. She is kind and considerate, but still afraid to stand up for herself. Especially when it comes to her stalker Ade.

**ADE**

Male, dark skin tone, 40s - 50s.

Tall, intimidating, deeply unsettling. Stalker presence, threatening. Strong physical presence. Very smug and cocky. To the point of unbearable. 

**DARREN** (Blossom love interest)

Male, 30s‚Äì40s.

Short man, sweet, warm, confident but sensitive. Blossoms love interest and the opposite of Ade. Darren is in love with Blossom and is happy just to spend time with her and even wants to embrace her culture and be a part of her life. He is looked down upon and seen as too soft, especially from Ade. But there is more to Darren than meets the eye.

**NIGEL**

Male, late 30s‚Äì50s.

Soft, friendly, policeman. Awkward. Very innocent and na√Øve. Stuff that goes on in the brothel could be seen to make him feel uncomfortable. Good hearted individual.

**STEVE (Office Pennington, Policeman)**

Male, late 20s‚Äì30s.

Stiff, easily flustered police officer. Easily manipulated. Tries to act all hard and tough when he is just a pawn for a bigger scheme to be revealed later in the series. Entangled with Lydia.

topComments.text: This sounds brilliant. I‚Äôll be sending an email in!

SUPPORTING

If interested, please contact M.McGrath@2024.ljmu.ac.uk stating the role in which you are interested, any prior experience, and a head shot.

sharedPost.text:
Der Kino Mittwoch auf radioYpsilon 

MOVIETIME KW 8/2026

CHRIS HEMSWORTH ALS MEISTERDIEB, HOLLYWOOD IM INTERCONT UND TABUTHEMA SCHLAGANFALL

Unsere Filmexpertin pr√§sentiert die Neustarts der Woche in den Kooperationskinos,  den Actioner CRIME 101 oder den Animationshit G.O.A.T.

Au√üerdem kommt mit dem √ñ Film DER SOUFFLEUR Hollywood mit William Dafoe nach Wien. Dazu ein Interview mit einen Castmitglied, Claus Philipp.

Im Dok Film RENATE wird √ºber das Thema Schlaganfall, dessen Folgen und Neubeginn erz√§hlt. Wir konnten mit Regisseur Martin Nyguen ein Gespr√§ch f√ºhren.

Abgerundet wird die Sendung wie immer mit Musik aus den Soundtracks der letzten 85 Jahre.

Mittwoch 18.2.2026 von 18 bis 19h auf radioYpsilon 94.5 oder via Stream (http://mp3.radioypsilon.at:8000/)

Want to smash it in acting? üé≠ This clip from my chat with aspiring actors is pure gold‚Äîit's all about that proper graft when no one's hiring you. Shift your mindset, set proper goals, and treat your career like a 9-to-5 job. The harder you work, the "luckier" you'll get. Trust me, this changed everything for me.

Watch the full video on YouTube for more straight-talking advice that'll up your game: Link in comments
items.title: Stop Being Realistic (It's Ruining Your Acting Career)

items.text:
Afternoon all,

As a former actor, I understand how financially draining and demoralising the industry can be. 

So I recently launched **Self Tape Battle. **It's the first competitive actors app where actors compete in weekly monologue challenges, with the highest voted entry winning the battle prize. 

As actors enter multiple battles, they are training, keeping skills fresh between projects and auditions, and earning something back - While building a diverse portfolio visible to industry professionals. 

We've had 3 amazing battles so far, giving away an **Annual Spotlight Membership**, a **Professional Headshot Session**, and our **in-app coins** which can be withdrawn to **real money.** There's a new prize each week.

Not ready to battle? - You can still support your fellow actors by voting, and leaving constructive feedback on their tapes. You still earn participation coins! It's an eco-system designed to provide value at every angle.

Our next battle is this Sunday, come join 248 other actors in the Arena! üèüÔ∏è

[https://selftapebattle.com](https://selftapebattle.com)

[https://instagram.com/selftapebattle](https://instagram.com/selftapebattle)

üö¢|üåä|üí¶|üõ≥Ô∏è|‚öì|CRUISE SHIP CASTING! Circus Guide Entertainment is auditioning for a STRONG Male+Female circus duo with ground and aerial acts.

Contract Conditions:

- Contract begins middle of March 

- Duration seven months long including rehearsal period

- Must have Adagio Duo and Aerial Duo Acts (Straps & Solo Aerial Acts)

- Must be available for the entire length of the contract

- Functional English language

Prior the boarding:

- Must obtain medical certificates, visas

- Attend necessary training, and certification

Interested in this casting call? 

For more contract details: casting[at]circusguideagency.com

===

Register with us here: https://www.circusguideagency.com/jobs-available

UPLOAD YOUR PROMO PACKAGE HERE: https://www.circusguideagency.com/performer-registration/upload-your-promos

- CV - Your height / weight, latest employment, acts performed, and training received is a must!

- PHOTOS - Portrait, and fitness photos (taken on the date of submission) for each member of your act. Up to 10 quality photos of your act

- ACT VIDEOS - Latest full promo videos made no later than 6 months ago. A short 1 min About me video in English

PLEASE NOTE! You can share your presentation folder with Drive, or Dropbox links.

Join our exclusive Circus Guide Entertainment Agency group for even more job offers and casting calls:

https://www.facebook.com/groups/CircusGuideEntertainmentJobs

items.text:
TV 2 s√∏ger mennesker p√• mellem 20-40 √•r, som er klar til at udforske intimitet, n√¶rhed og sig selv.  

P√• et 2-ugers retreat i Sydeuropa i smukke og trygge omgivelser bliver du en del af et f√¶llesskab med andre mennesker i samme situation. Her bliver du st√∏ttet og guidet af et team af landets bedste sexologer og terapeuter.  

Det er hverken dating eller en konkurrence. Det handler ikke om at pr√¶stere, men om at l√¶re dig selv bedre at kende - i dit eget tempo og med respekt for dine gr√¶nser.  

Hvem ved - m√•ske tager du hjem med en st√∏rre ro, mere mod og en ny tro p√•, at n√¶rhed og relationer ogs√• kan v√¶re noget for dig. 

M√•ske er det ikke dig, men en du kender, der kunne have gl√¶de af et luksuri√∏st retreat og et trygt f√¶llesskab.  

Vil du helt uforpligtende h√∏re mere, og har du nogle sp√∏rgsm√•l, s√• skriv p√• denne mail:
cast@nordiskfilmtv.com eller l√¶s mere om tv-programmet og ans√∏g via dette link: https://shortaudition.com/TV2program

Ready to Commit to Your Craft? Join Me for a Live Meisner Introduction

Are you an actor tired of quick fixes and shortcuts? Ready to dive deep and build real, lasting skills? This online taster session is your chance to meet me, ask your burning questions, and experience the foundation of the Meisner technique‚Äîa method that transforms not just your acting, but your connection to the craft.

Whether you‚Äôre just starting out or looking to deepen your work, this hour is designed for actors who are serious about growth and ready to commit.

Reserve your spot now for Tuesday, February 17th, 7-8 pm online. Spaces are limited‚Äîdon‚Äôt miss this opportunity to step into your power as an actor

hello@meisnerlondon.com

Du willst als Schauspieler:in ernst genommen werden? Aber du hast keine Ausbildung?
Eine Schauspielschule in Vollzeit kommt f√ºr dich gerade nicht infrage.

Job. Miete. Alltag. Realit√§t.

Vielleicht kennst du diese Gedanken:

‚ÄûOhne Ausbildung nimmt mich sowieso niemand ernst.‚Äú

‚ÄûIch bin Quereinsteiger:in, ich habe ja nichts vorzuweisen.‚Äú

‚ÄûF√ºr eine richtige Schauspielschule ist es jetzt zu sp√§t.‚Äú

Gerade hier im Raum K√∂ln gibt es viele Talente, die genau daran scheitern, nicht am K√∂nnen. 

Die Wahrheit ist:

Was dich ernstzunehmend macht, ist nicht der Titel auf dem Papier sondern saubere Grundlagen, Technik, Pr√§senz und professionelle Vorbereitung.

Und genau deshalb haben wir eine berufsbegleitende Schauspielausbildung in Abendform aufgebaut. Speziell f√ºr Menschen, die arbeiten, aber ihren Traum nicht aufgeben wollen.

Mich w√ºrde interessieren:

Wer hier aus K√∂ln oder Umgebung tr√§umt davon im Bereich Schauspiel zu arbeiten hat aber keine klassische Ausbildung?

Ich erkl√§re dir gern, wie du professionell starten kannst, ohne deinen Job aufzugeben.

Schreib **‚ÄûActing‚Äú** in die Kommentare oder schreib mir eine Nachricht.

items.text:
Casting call!!!!
Hey everyone, I'm just about halfway done casting for my upcoming romance film "A Handful of Love and Demons to Hate" based on a novel just published! The roles listed below are what I'm still in need of, so a character you can portray just send it to the email provided and follow the instructions on the flyer. I can't wait to get started soon and I look forward to everyone's submission. This does take place in GA and filming will start sometime in April. I plan to be finished by mid July. This is non paid however you will receive credit so just letting everyone know. To offset not being able to pay those brining my production together, I will be hosting a wrap up event/party for the last day of filming, offering low price novel copies to the cast instead of regular price, and sending you early access of the finished movie product that way you can see it before it comes out. Also you might have to click on the pictures of the roles because they can look blurry/pixelated at first then they clear up

Casting Call!
Non-Union, Unpaid

Looking for actress between the ages of 45-50.

Film Title: Wops In A Basement

Genre: Short Film, Dark Comedy

Longline: An Italian-Canadian family try to have a peaceful dinner in their basement while their house is under renovation which leads to a chaotic and bloody solution.

Character:

Patty DiLeo (Caucasian): Ages 45-50. Tony‚Äôs wife who is very judgmental and likes to run her mouth a lot. 

Shooting date: Saturday, March 7th 2026

Location: Toronto, Ontario, Canada 

Actresses, send headshots, resumes and demo reels to wopsshortfilm@gmail.com if interested.

Food and drinks with be provided on set.

Thank you!

items.text:
Hey everyone,
I‚Äôm currently looking for actors and actresses who genuinely want to participate in small comedy sketches and skits ‚Äî think along the lines of Saturday Night Live or MADtv style content.
I already have some skits and sketches written and ready to go. What I need now are people who are actually down to commit ‚Äî even if it‚Äôs just every other week or every three weeks. Consistency is key.
I run a TikTok account, Instagram page, and Facebook page, and I‚Äôm really trying to build and blow up on social media ‚Äî with a solid team around me. This is about creating something funny, consistent, and shareable that helps all of us grow.

topComments.text: I‚Äôd love to connect with you! David Sauceda

I‚Äôm an editorial and high-fashion photographer with experience shooting for celebrities, designers, and commercial clients in Vietnam, and I‚Äôm looking to build strong creative relationships here in London.

items.text:
# **REAP LOVE: SHORT FILM CASTING CALL **
> ***"What would happen if the Grim Reaper falls in love?"***

Hi guys, hope you are all well! 

Currently, I am producing a short film called ‚ÄòReap Love‚Äô, and we are casting one of our main actors, ‚ÄúThe Reaper‚Äù, for this short film! 

**LOGLINE**: When the Grim Reaper meets a girl in a near-death experience, he must choose between love and his soul-collecting job

**LEAD ROLE** ‚ÄúThe Reaper‚Äù: (Lead, Male, 20-29): Tim Burton-like appearance. Preferably tall around 5'10 - 6'0. This is a non-dialogue role, focused on good control of facial expression. The character is a loner who is emotionally numb, buried in his job and closed off to the world around him. Later, towards the end of the film, he begins to learn to express his emotions through the love he finds unexpectedly (additionally, there is one kiss scene included in this film)

This is a non-dialogue role with the focus in good control with facial and bodily expression

**REQUIRED MEDIA**: Headshot/Photo, Video Reel, Resume

**SHOOT LOCATIONS**: Focused in Farnham & Guildford 

**SHOOT DATES**: Monday 2nd March - Friday 6th March 2026 

**COMPENSATION**: Unpaid, but Travel & Catering will be covered and provided for the shoot week. 

I have linked the Mandy and Backstage casting platforms for anyone interested in the main role: 

**MANDY**: [[https://www.mandy.com/aa/project/3103444/reap-love/?role_id=5469086](https://www.mandy.com/aa/project/3103444/reap-love/?role_id=5469086)](https://www.mandy.com/aa/project/3103444/reap-love/?role_id=5469086)

**BACKSTAGE**: [[https://www.backstage.com/casting/reap-love-3104102/](https://www.backstage.com/casting/reap-love-3104102/)](https://www.backstage.com/casting/reap-love-3104102/)

Please contact me as soon as possible (either by the casting platforms, Facebook platform or via email renee_sugui@hotmail.com) if you are interested or know anyone else who would be interested to be onboard with this film! 

Many thanks !! xx

items.text:
CASTING CALL ‚Äì COMMUNITY NOTICE

We‚Äôre student filmmakers casting our final short film, Community Notice  set during a community meeting about a missing cat, and the tensions that quietly surface in the room.

We‚Äôre looking for strong, naturalistic performers across a range of roles. 

üìç Filming in Belfast
üí∞ Paid 

As this is an independent student production, we‚Äôre also currently fundraising to support the film‚Äôs production costs. If you‚Äôd like to support the project.

https://gofund.me/f58297f42

To apply, send your headshot, showreel (if available), and a short introduction to:
üì© communitynoticeshortfilm@gmail.com

Selected applicants will receive self - tape materials 

Thanks 
Lucy Young 
(Writer & Director)

items.summary: Nur in Berlin so?
items.title: Nur in Berlin so?

sharedPost.text:
‚Ä¶Bilder aus den Kindertagen. An einem sch√∂nen Ort. Und das geht jeder Generation so.üòäVon 1964 bis ca. 1984 lebte ich in Bant. Meine Kumpel waren die Wiesner‚Äòs, Holger Pechmann, Gadaus, Witt‚Äòs und so einige weitere Bolzplatz-Kumpel. Unser Verein Darmals: ESV 
Meine besten Freunde und gleichzeitig Klassenkameraden waren Heiko Harms und J√∂rg Robbers. Viele sch√∂ne Bilder in meinem Kopf.

items.text:
Seeking individuals who fit the non-speaking roles listed below to be in a small business social media video campaign filming in **Metro Vancouver** on **Feb 27 or 28.**

**Paid** | $30 CAD per hour, minimum 4 hours.

Email us your **full name**,** contact info** (including your **phone number**, **headshot**, and **availability** to INFO@YYMEDIACO.COM.

S**ubject line: SOCIAL MEDIA + THE ROLE YOU ARE SUBMITTING FOR + YOUR NAME**

Non-union actors only. Prior acting experience is not required.

sharedPost.text:
Casting : "Maybe its love, maybe not"

I am Thomas Goersch from Stuttgart Germany. 
Actor and Filmdirector. 
I am making Independent Movies.
I present my movies on International Film festivals and was lucky to receive some awards. 
But the work is not about awards and money, its about making movies for the people to think about.
My next movie is a modern love story:
An elderly man is meeting another younger, very attractive man in the Internet.  But they are from different Continents. They start a long distance relastionship ship. which is full of passion and desire. 
One day the younger man starts to ask for money, cause he is a Student and no more able to pay his bills. 
The older man is full of distrust.
Is he only there  to pay his lovers bills or is there love between them ?
A story with two endings.
One with true love and one with only cheating. Based on a real story.
I am looking for the young attraktive Lover.
Men  25 to 42 years old,  good looking  who is able to film his parts on his own by smartshone
I am always open and honest. You can earn no money on this. but maybe there is a good film in the end promoting for you.
I guess its not necessary that an educated actor is playing this part. so feel free to get in touch
Thats me 
www.imdb.com/name/nm1591928
Get in touch under Thomas.Goersch@vodafonemail.de 
please ask for details.

items.text:
‚ö°Ô∏èNeed to create your first showreel / freshen up your old one?‚ö°Ô∏è
Happy Sunday all!

I provide a very affordable showreel service for new or established actors/directors/cinematographers/comedians/hobbyists etc.

Basically, send me your footage (or I can try and source it for you online if it's commercially aired) and I shall edit it together into a lovely reel.

Please see samples of recent clients in the link below üòé

I'm an actor myself so I know how frustrating it can be, especially when you're starting out, to collate your footage together to get more work, without wanting to spend a fortune.

My rates are ¬£20/hour, with duration of work depending on how much footage you have. The average reels have been around ¬£80-¬£100 for my clients. Much more affordable than the companies that charge ¬£250+ !!

For any further info / enquiries / to book my services, drop me an email and I'll respond as quickly as I can:

reelsforanyone@gmail.com

I'll look forward to hearing from you.

Thanks!

üòé

www.youtube.com/@Reels.For.Anyone
